src:
Hårdare tag väntar i Colorado
Oljebolagen i Colorado har varit särskilt utsatta för regelivriga politiker. Delstatens nya regler innebär sannolikt högre kostnader för bolagen, enligt en expert.
03 Nov 2019, 21:09 by Frida Wallnor

text:
Harder tag waiting in Colorado
Colorado oil companies have been particularly vulnerable to regulars. The state's new rules are likely to mean higher costs for the companies, according to one expert.
03 Nov 2019, 21:09 by Frida Wallnor
